name: Farm Fighter
description:
As in every harvest time, goblins came again. 

Can you get rid of them?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Farm Fighter is a top down shooter game where you protect your farm against goblins.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The controls are simple:

WASD to Move

Space to Roll

Tab for Inventory

Left Mouse Button to Shoot

Right Mouse Button to Change Weapon

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was made by MegaFocus in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52

Ludum Dare Entry Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/farm-fighter
